text: Ammovouno (Greek: Αμμόβουνο) is a village in the Evros regional unit of northeast Greece. Ammovouno is in the municipal unit of Orestiada. Ammovouno's 2011 population was 113 for the village. It is located on the right bank of the river Ardas ==History== Ammovouno before 1920 called Samona. ==References== Category:Populated places in Evros (regional unit)
title: Ammovouno
